item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-06-04T08:54:06.522Z -- CODESYS -- CODESYS Control for BeagleBone SL
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use aÂ malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.
